did.unittitle: Papers of the Twin Oaks Community

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Written permission of the Twin Oaks Communities Board is required for access.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Twin Oaks Community , Accession #9840-x, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection is a deposit made to the Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library of the University of Virginia from the Twin Oaks Community in Louisa, VA 23093 on September 26, 2001.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Twin Oaks is a collective settlement established in 1967 in Louisa County, Virginia and inspired by B.F. Skinner's Walden Two. The leadership of the Twin Oaks Community is a group of two or three members who serve on a board called Community Planners, the terms of which rotate after a designated period of time. Members write opinion and idea papers and post ideas on a community bulletin board in order to contribute their input regarding all of the decisions made by the community planners.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 600 items, 3.5 Hollinger boxes, and 2 linear feet and includes information about the Twin Oaks Community in Louisa, Virginia from 1970-1989 and 1997.

Most of the papers are organized by Councils composed of Twin Oaks members, including the Agriculture Council, Culture Council, Health Council, Income Council, Office Council, Outreach Council, and Planning Council. These papers consist of meeting minutes, reports, planning notes, and surveys.

Areas of special interest include opinion and idea papers that are written by members, planner's meeting minutes that reveal the inner workings of Twin Oaks and individual personalities and relationships of the members and planners. (Opinion and idea papers and planner's meeting minutes can be found under each council depending on the subject.)
There is extensive information about the Income Council and the products and services of Twin Oaks such as hammocks, tofu, indexing for the government and designs for numeric keyboards.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged alphabetically by Councils and is chronological within each folder. There are opinion and idea papers for almost every topic that is pertinent to Twin Oaks, and they are included throughout this collection under each Council.

did.unittitle: Agriculture Council. Farming. Fixed Asset Summaries, 1982-1985

scopecontent.p: Notebook; quarterly fixed asset summaries and projections; paper on cost accounting system.

did.unittitle: Agriculture Council. Food Laws, 1937-1968

scopecontent.p: Printed material of federal and state food laws and regulations.

did.unittitle: Culture. Books and Resources, 1975-1981; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Reference booklet about using government publications in Alderman library; notes on patent; maps of University campuses and libraries; a guide to reference books in the UVA Darden School Library; library directory.

arrangement.p: Opinion and idea papers from members about personal health issues; greeting cards for child birth; list of people who have suffered from the "plague" 1984; Opinion and idea paper on wheel-chair accessibility at Twin Oaks; health trip policies.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Hammocks. Chairs, 1977; 1980

scopecontent.p: Report on hammock chair; letter announcing Twin Oaks' participation at the Chicago Expocenter for the world's largest Casual Furniture show

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew, 1976-1980; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Various reports and papers of the New Industry Crew.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Indusry Crew, 1983-1984; 1988; 1992; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Opinion and idea papers on ways of increasing income, the project evaluation process of activities to replace their hammock industry, a publications related business, income from writing abstracts, the politics of occupational safety, and footrests for chairs; New products proposal; Income funds statement of cash flows; instructions for keypad widget project.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Business Papers, 1977-1978

scopecontent.p: Opinion and idea papers about updates on the Rope Machine, about income activities at home, and on a survey analysis of their hammock industry; Case study about possible activities to replace their hammock industry; report on backpackers; income activities of their many business services.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Cable Making, 1980-1981

scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous information about cable manufacturers and computer distributors; Overview of conversation with Keith regarding cables; Inmac winter '81 catalog of computer supplies, accessories and cables; information from Craig Data Cable Company about their products.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Correspondence, 1980-1981

scopecontent.p: Frontier Cooperative Herbs flyer; Letters to various people asking for suggestions on new money-making ideas; Alliance of Warehouses and Federations Newsletter.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Criteria Process, 1980; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Rough draft of revised New Industry Proposal Form; report on the Planning Council criteria discussion; Income and Funds Statement; Criteria for a Twin Oaks Industry; industry expenses.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Direct Mail, 1978

scopecontent.p: Notes from Direct Mail and Mail Order Handbook.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Factory Subcontracts, 1980-1981

scopecontent.p: Research on getting factory subcontracts; Notes on an interview regarding how to do "Time Studies;" information on various business in Richmond and Charlottesville.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Financial Analysis, 1973-1981

scopecontent.p: Booklet on business plans for small service firms and simple breakeven analysis for small stores; invoice; letter from a materials testing company; Cost of goods worksheet.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Financial Concepts, 1977-1978; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Evaluation of the chair project; articles on capital budgeting; report on incremental cost analysis; report about comparing payback on projects; booklet on how to read a financial report.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Financial Management, 1977; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Checklist on evaluating financial management in your organization; Booklet on management training seminars; Booklet on cash flow planning.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Herb Gardening, 1981

scopecontent.p: Reply card about catalogs and ordering information; invoice; herb seed order information.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Market Research, 1977-1978

scopecontent.p: Guidelines for market research questionnaire; report on a New Industry Crew trip to Washington, D.C.; review of evaluating New Product Proposals; Successful Communications Techniques Booklet; Marketing Course Outline.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Meeting Notes, 1976-1978; n.y.

scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes and notes.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Meeting Notes, 1980-1981; n.d.; n.y.

scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes and notes.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Organic Candy, n.d.

scopecontent.p: Flyer for Twin Oaks Organic Candy.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Resources, 1980 -1981; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Various furniture catalogs; Opinion and idea paper about new wood products; notes from a brainstorming session.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Right Livelihood Business, 1975-1978; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Article on alternative growing practices; Right Livelihood Business Conference; Notes and pamphlets.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Solar Batch Heater, 1981

scopecontent.p: Notes on the Solar Batch Heater; guidelines from the National Bureau of Standard regarding energy-related invention evaluation requests.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Wood, 1981

scopecontent.p: Estimated cost worksheet for various wood projects; overhead costs worksheet; route sheet for various projects.

did.unittitle: Income Council. New Industry Crew. Wood Stoves, 1976-1981

scopecontent.p: Information on wood stoves.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Outside Work/Odd Jobs, 1980; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Information on energy businesses; Notes on odd jobs.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Quarterly Summaries. (Product Council), 1978-1982

scopecontent.p: End of quarter summaries; business report on new industry studies.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Return on Investment, 1975-1976

scopecontent.p: Notes and calculations on returns of investments; Brochure for a course on how to use returns to make a profit; Business Monthly newsletter.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Survey, 1977

scopecontent.p: Survey analysis.

did.unittitle: Income Council. Accounting, 1982; 1985; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Proposal to assist Twin Oaks Community; letters to planners and accounting dept; report about Gesundheit loan; worksheet.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Accouting. Accounting Project, 1981-1982

scopecontent.p: Report on a proposal for an improved accounting system; report on an accounting system project; letters from several different accounting firms.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Accounting. Fixed Asset Summaries Actuals, 1979-1982

scopecontent.p: Fixed asset action summaries and purchases breakdown summary.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Accounting. Loans. East Wind Community,

scopecontent.p: East Wind Community balance sheets; Cash flow loan to East Wind; planner's approval; promissory note.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Accounting. Personal Money, 1977-1993

scopecontent.p: Report on Twin Oaks policies about money; Community gift policy; proposal about a new system for getting personal money; surveys about obtaining personal money.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Accounting. Vacation Earnings Policy, 1983-1984; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Community meeting notes on vacation earnings policies.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Office, 1975-1984

scopecontent.p: Proposal for less traffic; letter about shipping policy; proposal for a comprehensive office plan; office services questionnaire; notes about office space problems.

did.unittitle: Office Council. Office. Computer Services, 1981-1984; 1989

scopecontent.p: Bruce's computer proposal; computer update; financial request for new computer equipment; Community meeting regarding computers.

did.unittitle: Outreach Council. Local Relations. Louisa County, 1975; 1978

scopecontent.p: Population and Employment data; Publication: Virginia Economic Indicator vo. XII no. 6 June 1978.

did.unittitle: Outreach Council. Visitor Program, 1978-1985

scopecontent.p: Visitor logbook with comments from visitors; Visiting Twin Oaks manuals.

did.unittitle: Planning Council. Economic Planning. Appendix B. Industry Review, 1979

scopecontent.p: Notebook.

did.unittitle: Planning Council. Social Planning. Goals & Values, 1979; n.d.

scopecontent.p: Meeting notes, including plans for discontinuing business with Pier One; article on economics values and goals, updates on membership satisfaction goals.

did.unittitle: Planning Council. Social Planning. Small Living Groups. Notebook, 1981-1983
Planning Council. Social Planning. Small Living Groups, n. d.

scopecontent.p: Handbook, policies, decisions, opinion and idea papers and plan writing worksheet.

did.unittitle: Planning Council. Social Planning. Systems Project as a Problem Solving Tool, 1977

scopecontent.p: Theoretical paper on how to approach a project.

did.unittitle: Correspondence. National Business Directory, n.d.

scopecontent.p: List of Businesses.
